hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience focused on web development. Visionary and creative problem solver. Autodidact who rapidly understands new concepts, ideas, technologies and methodologies.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I've been working as a web developer since 2019, with more than 5 years of university studies and projects as a self-taught developer. Currently, I focus on web technologies like React, Node, Express and MySQL.

projects.title: Projects

contact.subtitle: Do you have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it. I'm available for new opportunities and collaborations.

footer.description: Full-stack developer passionate about creating innovative and efficient web solutions. Always learning and growing in the world of technology.
